__e: Just because you can't make your own friends doesn't mean you can snake mine.
But maybe Matty and I shouldn't have done anything until we knew each other better.
I made an oversight, Miss Matty, and now much hangs in the balance.
I don't know what to think.
Miss Matty. I was wondering if I might beg a word. Of course, my dear.
- My sister in-law. A plaid shawl. And a black silk.
